summary:
Kerr said it’s way too early for him to think about what the Warriors will do if Butler can’t go Saturday. “But we have to wait to see with the MRI.”

Butler was injured when Thompson was pushed into his legs as he jumped to try and grab a rebound. “It was just one of those plays.”

Butler, who had three points and two rebounds before leaving, had 25 points, seven rebounds and six assists in Golden State’s 95-85 win in Game 1.
